snippet: Japan’s cabinet approved a new national energy strategy on Friday that designates nuclear power as an important energy source and calls for restarting idled nuclear plants that meet new safety standards.
abstract: Japan's cabinet approves a new national energy strategy that designates nuclear power an important energy source and calls for restarting nuclear plants that meet new safety standards.
lead_paragraph: Japan’s cabinet approved a new national energy strategy on Friday that designates nuclear power as an important energy source and calls for restarting idled nuclear plants that meet new safety standards.
